text: Kepha abanolwazi olunzulu phakathi kwabo kanye nabakholwayo abakholelwa kulokho okwehliselwa phansi kuwena nakulokho okwehliselwa phansi ngaphambilini kwakho nabenza umthandazo nabakhiphi bezakaah (ingxenye yengcebo enikwa abampofu) nabakholwa kuMvelinqangi nasosukwini lokugcina labo-ke siyobanika umvuzo omkhulu
